column4: I'm trying to figure out why I can't play back mp3's from amarok, xine, vlc or noatun, but I can with mpg321.  I am running kubuntu gutsy and I have installed gstream, kubuntu-restricted-extras and libxine1.  I've asked on #kubuntu but to no avail and thought I'd ping this channel.  Any suggestions?
have you uninstalled the stuff like ubuntu-restricted-extras and then reinstalled kubuntu-restricted-extras? that would seem to be the source of your problems
come back tomorrow and well get you sorted
